content.author: netupb
content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] upb LSR Fleet Management
content.description: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Краткое описание: Мод upb lsr fleet management упрощает управление флотом и подчинёнными. EN: Allows for automatic construction of exploding ships in a registered fleet and preserving the fleet structure. (for commanders or all their subordinates). Note: For fleets whose Commander is a station, only the station itself cannot be produced.
